title: chestcommands插件如何用自定义指令打开
author: xius

replies.author: 雪狼神
replies.txt_content:
menu-settings:
  name: '&4快捷菜单'
  rows: 1
  command: 'abc' ←例子：指令/abc，任意修改，不用加斜杠
弄完之后别忘了给玩家打开菜单的权限

replies.author: Ghost__
replies.txt_content:
menu-settings:
  name: "主菜单"
  rows: 6
  command: "cd" 这里就是自定义指令处随便填写 最好不要跟别的指令重复
  open-with-item:
    item-id: 347
    left-click: false
    right-click: true
